author: AddictedToStyrene
title: Rare character on a secure chain
review:
Secure is the word - the keychain on this figure is definitely there for good. There is little else to say about the figure - he is also available in 8036 Separatists' Shuttle, and the 852844 Star Wars Magnet set.
The figure's head is the same mould as Greedo - but in Green, with blue eyes. The figure parts are attached to each other permanently, as with other key chains. It's a neat way of getting a rare figure, but it's not easy to remove the chain without damaging the minifig.
